item.description:
From the Publisher:

"It’s the big game. You’re there. You’re in your seat. You’re ready. But then, Oh-oh! Suddenly you feel the need – the need for greed!

That’s right, it’s PIE TIME!! Quick, out of your seat! Out of the stadium!! Go get those pies and get back with them before the clock runs out!!!

But, hold on! You’re not alone. Look around you! There are other players – and they’re after YOUR PIES!! They’re just as needy, just as greedy, but are they just as speedy as you?!"

And from a publisher's press release:
"The setting of the game is a sports stadium surrounded by concession stands selling Pies. Your playing piece is one of 8 comically greedy cartoon characters with a single-minded desire for Pies. With the clock ticking, the object of the game is to move your character out of the stadium, rush from Pie-stand to Pie-stand collecting as many Pies as possible and return with them to your seat before the time runs out. But, along the way, there are a myriad of dirty tricks and hazards. Elbow your opponents as you pass and make them drop their Pies! Trip them up and make them miss a turn! Make them slip on Banana Peels and make them drop a Pie AND miss a turn!! Lock them out of turnstiles! Lock them out of bathrooms! And, of course, your opponents are going to try to do the same to you. Plus, you’ve got to be careful of those turnstiles – you and your Pies might not fit through them! And, all the time, you’ve got to watch out for those Pies – some of them are Dodgy Pies! They might not like you as much as you like them!!"

In this game the players' decide how many rounds they will play and set the timer for the game.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
